sentences.sContent: Objective: To sieve out the best methods for nevus treatment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To sieve out the best methods for nevus treatment.
sentences.sCn: 目的：筛选皮肤色素痣的最佳治疗方法。

sentences.sContent: The blue nevus and Mongolian spots are examples of this light dispersion effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: The blue nevus and Mongolian spots are examples of this light dispersion effect.
sentences.sCn: 蓝痣和蒙古斑就是这种光散射效应的例子。

sentences.sContent: Methods 38 cases of large scar and giant nevus were treated with full-thickness skin grafts harvested from expanded flaps.
sentences.sContent_eng: Methods 38 cases of large scar and giant nevus were treated with full-thickness skin grafts harvested from expanded flaps.
sentences.sCn: 方法：利用扩张皮瓣取大面积全厚皮片游离移植治疗大面积体表瘢痕、巨痣等38例次。

trans.tranOther: any congenital growth or pigmented blemish on the skin; birthmark or mole
